select count(prd_id) from tbl_prd where 1=1 and sel_id = #{sel_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_prd ( prd_id, category_id, sel_id, prd_ea, prd_name, prd_thumb, prd_comment, prd_img, prd_stock, prd_price, prd_sale, prd_kg, prd_from, prd_wrap, prd_info) values((select nvl(max(prd_id)+1, 1) from tbl_prd), (select category_id from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select sel_id from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_ea from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_name from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_thumb from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_comment from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_img from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_stock from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_price from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), 0, (select prd_kg from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_from from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_wrap from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}), (select prd_info from tbl_prd_b where prd_id=#{prd_id}))
mapper.select: select prd_id, category_id, sel_id, prd_ea, prd_name, prd_thumb, prd_comment, prd_img, prd_stock, prd_price, prd_sale, prd_kg, prd_from, prd_wrap, prd_info from tbl_prd where prd_id = #{prd_id}
select category_name from tbl_category where category_id = (select category_id from tbl_prd where prd_id = #{prd_id})
select tp.category_id, tc.category_name, ts.sel_cname from tbl_category tc, tbl_prd tp, tbl_seller ts where tp.category_id = tc.category_id and tp.sel_id = ts.sel_id
select tpb.category_id, tc.category_name, ts.sel_cname from tbl_category tc, tbl_prd_b tpb, tbl_seller ts where tpb.category_id = tc.category_id and tpb.sel_id = ts.sel_id
mapper.update: update tbl_prd set prd_ea = #{prd_ea}, prd_name = #{prd_name}, prd_thumb = #{prd_thumb}, prd_comment = #{prd_comment}, prd_img = #{prd_img}, prd_stock = #{prd_stock}, prd_price = #{prd_price}, prd_sale = #{prd_sale}, prd_kg = #{prd_kg}, prd_from = #{prd_from}, prd_wrap = #{prd_wrap}, prd_info = #{prd_info} where prd_id = #{prd_id}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_category order by category_id asc
select * from tbl_category where category_id = #{category_id}

select * from tbl_prd where category_id = #{category_id}

select tp.prd_id, tp.prd_thumb, tp.prd_img, tp.prd_name, tp.prd_kg, tp.prd_price, tp.prd_comment, tp.category_id, tc.category_p_id, tp.prd_sale from tbl_prd tp, tbl_category tc where tp.prd_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and tp.category_id = tc.category_id

select tp.prd_id, tp.prd_thumb, tp.prd_img, tp.prd_name, tp.prd_kg, tp.prd_price, tp.prd_comment, tp.category_id, tc.category_p_id, tp.prd_sale from tbl_prd tp, tbl_category tc where prd_sale != 0 and tp.category_id = tc.category_id order by prd_sale desc
select * from (select tp.prd_id, tp.category_id, tp.prd_name, tp.prd_thumb, tp.prd_price, tp.prd_sale from tbl_prd tp order by prd_stock desc ) where rownum <=4
select * from (select tp.prd_id, tp.category_id, tp.prd_name, tp.prd_thumb, tp.prd_price, tp.prd_sale from tbl_prd tp order by prd_sale desc ) where rownum <=4
select * from (select tp.prd_id, tp.category_id, tp.prd_name, tp.prd_thumb, tp.prd_price, tp.prd_sale from tbl_prd tp order by prd_date desc ) where rownum <=4

select * from (select tp.prd_id, tp.category_id, tc.category_p_id, tp.prd_name, tp.prd_thumb, tp.prd_price, tp.prd_sale from tbl_prd tp, tbl_category tc where tc.category_p_id=#{category_p_id} order by dbms_random.value) where rownum <=4
